channel.title: bap on Cork OpenCoffee
channel.description: Recent content in bap on Cork OpenCoffee

item.title: Next OpenCoffee in NSC on Friday
item.description: The next Cork OCC is on this Friday in the board room of the NSC in Mahon. It is a bit different from our normal get-together for two reasons. The first is that it starts at 9am instead of the usual 10. The second is that it’s a joint event with SohoSolo. This means we’ll have a bigger group that usual. There won’t be a formal demo but we will hear a short intro about SohoSolo and the other services of CorkBIC who have been strong supporters of OpenCoffee since it started.
